useCase.name: Restrict File Access
useCase.description: This use case involves an Archivist requesting to restrict access to a file in the system.

successEndConditions.condition: The file access is successfully restricted for the Archivist.

failureEndConditions.condition: The file access restriction process fails.

useCase.trigger: An Archivist requests to restrict file access.

mainSequence.step: Archivist credentials are validated by the Web Interface.
The relevant form for further restriction details is presented by the Web Interface.
The file metadata is updated with the restriction details by the Database.
The access restrictions applied successfully by the File Management System.
A success message with the outcome is displayed to the Archivist.
